name: I'm Mahnaz
achievements_desc: Intern at Asoda Awar and CS OF CS
about_me_description: Hello! It's Me(Mahnaz Faizi) I'm 20-years-old. dynamo hailing from the cute land Herat, Afghanistan. I'm a web designer, a devoted person who has been in love with programming . I have been developing my talents, engrossed in the exciting world of web development. I'm eager to add my Knowledge to the front-end and back-end development industries, which is always changing.

projects.title: 1.Dice Game: A thrilling web game crafted using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
React Museum Website:  museum experience, meticulously crafted using React.js
Simon-Game: This classic Simon game recreated using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Bootstrap Service Project: A visually appealing project built using Bootstrap 4
CRUD App: A robust application developed with PHP and MySQL,(Create,Read,Update,Delete)
Watch Shop Website: A stylish online storefront designed with HTML and CSS
